name: Looty Dungeon
summary:
Outwit, outrun, and slay your enemies and in this never ending world of endless dungeons and epic boss battles. Play as a knight, an archer, a pair of dueling twins, a fairy, a wizard or any of the other 50 unforgettably unique characters.

Each room comes armed with spike traps, flameballs, catapults, flying arrows and a wide assortment of enemies to prevent you in your task of obtaining riches and glory from the depths of the dungeon.

We call on you adventurous souls, rogue warriors, clandestine cavern crawlers, and masterful mages: the dungeons are beckoning and the loot awaits!
